description: Evaluation cases for animation studio + Mind latent pipeline.

cases.prompt: Convert this into strict latent JSON: Create Ryxen as a reusable digital actor with consistent silhouette, neon cyan/magenta palette, sarcastic robot-demon personality, and a 4-panel story workflow.
Write a short 4-panel satirical script about Ryxen reacting to a wild market spike. Keep character voice sarcastic but lovable.
Generate 6 image prompts for Ryxen with consistent identity: 2 close-ups, 2 full-body, 2 dynamic poses. Include one shared negative prompt for all.
Create a weekly semi-autonomous production plan for an animation studio that must run while the user is at work. Include approvals, quality gates, and budget caps.
